channel.title: Looking for Developer partners For new oldschool bot
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Searching Developers for [font=comic sans ms]TSBot[/font][/size] [hr]
I am searching like 5 developers for TSBot. [hr] What do They need?
[ul][li]1 Year+ Java Knowlege[/li] [li]Must like to help others[/li] [li]No money Hungry[/li][/ul]
[hr] Me as Onwer has ofcourse knowlege in Java, Before i started my own bot i made some scripts for Powerbot for my own use i am a Beginner script writer. My Co-Owner Just started into Java and he is day and night bussy with Java ATM. I have more EXP in bots en Java, We are trying to make a Injection-Bot Basicly what Injection Bot does is injects a Java code in the original Source, to check how bots are build i decompiled a couple of bots.
We would add The standard Antiban like Rotating Camera, Break Handler, Sleep Mode, and if possible Auto Chat Responder The auto chat responder will use Reflection. [hr]
Application:
* Name: * Java Exp: * Why would you like to join TSBot:
(People who help free got more chance) [hr] [u]Post Application Here or Visit TSBot and Apply as Developer There[/u] [hr] TSBot Team

item.title: Looking for Developer partners For new oldschool bot
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I have removed the “helping costs” section of your application. We don’t allow any type of transaction to occur between our members on this forum with the exception of Scar scripts.

Read full topic

@lazy-pkz wrote:

Java Exp: I’ve Been Coding Since 2011 (I Code Java/Html/Css/PHP/Little Js)
Why would you like to join TSBot: I Would like to be in a project like that
Helping Costs: I Dont need the money, just little credits will be great. I like to be in the team.

item.title: Looking for Developer partners For new oldschool bot
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

you were already told you can’t post the link.

also, you need to provide some sort of way to explain to the reading users that you (and whoever else is at your community) has any given knowledge on the runescape client, and/or botting methods (hex color interpretation, reflection, actually using the robot, etc)

also, you should post some anti-b& methods, information, or techniques.

currently it seems like you have no idea what you’re doing, and hoping to find people who do.
and I, for one, would never trust any botting community that starts up the way you have.

don’t turn this into vault 2006 remake and not do any work and just promise it.
don’t turn this into any post by driman rune and never attempt any work
don’t turn this into powerbot or some shit to try and steal users accounts

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for Developer partners For new oldschool bot
